title: Adding a Photo Gallery to Your Website

messages.content:
I have this simple website that I want to add some photos and then i want to make another simple gallery page to show photos when they click "click here to see more" I want the first page to show perhaps 3 images on the bottom
Here's the HTML and here's the list of photos which will be found in a /images directory:

Aymen From The Ministry of Education (TVET).jpg
Beitna NGO Showcasing heritage sustainability practice of inner courtyard.jpg
Clean_Iraq_Mosul_River_Clean_Up.jpg
Climate Space Founders Pitching The Project At Mosul Space.jpg
Dr Bassam discussing sustainable heritage.jpg
Education festival.jpg
Festival of Private and Gov Education.jpg
Govornmental dialog.jpg
Heritage building - before renovations.jpg
Module 4 Implementation.JPG
Mosul Heritage Foundation Building.jpg
Mosul Heritage Foundatoin Detail.jpg
Mosul Space Building.jpg

Prehackathon Pitching.JPG
Prehackathon preparation.JPG
Qaf Lab Crew.jpg
Qaf Lab Inspirational Message.jpg
Recycled broken pottery used as insulation material.jpg
Riyadah.jpg
Sustainability Meetup Intro.JPG
Sustainability and Innovative Children.jpg
Sustainable Arhitecture Example - Iwan.jpg
UNESCO Renovated Heritage Building.jpg

attachments.extracted_content:
BEIT Project Reports

Building Equitable and Inclusive Transformation Project - Iraq

BEIT project Deliverables

üìÑ Deliverable 1: BEIT Sustainable Housing Modular Curriculum üìÑ Deliverable 2: Stakeholder Engagement and Material Validation üìÑ Deliverable 3: Monitoring and Evaluation Framework

Stakeholder Data and Visualizations:

üìÑ Implmentation Parter Data View üìÑ Implementing Partner Comparison Spider Chart üìÑ Implementing Partner Interview Transcripts and Insights üìÑ Implementing Partner Data Analysis üìÑ Implementing Partner Detail Information View

Content Creation Reports

üìÑ Sustainability and Reconstruction Meetup üìÑ Insights Report From Stakeholder Meetup üìÑ BEIT Curriculum Overview - shows the results of the prior work.

Training content provided by KESK and Mosul Solar:

üìÑ KESK Solar Training üìÑ Mosul Solar Training

messages.content: update the separate gallery to show all images, make all the divs, you can make only the div class = row section

content.text: update the separate gallery to show all images, make all the divs, you can make only the div class = row section

 This row section includes all 24 images from your list, with: - Responsive columns (col-md-4 means 3 images per row on medium and larger screens) - Proper image captions - Alt text for accessibility - Maintained file names as provided - Bootstrap's responsive classes You can insert this row section into your gallery.html file inside the gallery-grid div. Would you like me to: 1. Add any categories or filtering options? 2. Modify the layout (e.g., 2 or 4 images per row instead of 3)? 3. Add any additional features to the gallery?
